name: LeagueStreams
short_description:
LeagueStream is a free and portable client for browsing professional and enthusiast League of Legends players. LeagueStream was developed so that you may easily find your favourite player through a simple and logical structure. As well as showing streams, LeagueStream also shows information about the player such as role, full name, bio etc. and allows you to open the stream in a popout window that remains on top of other windows so that you can watch a stream whilst browsing guides, the forums or doing other things.



LeagueStream was developed by James Dardry (aka omgBunny, IllEágle). LeagueStream has no affiliation with Riot Games or League of Legends and is an independant 3rd party application.
LeagueStream is freeware and should not be charged for. If you have paid for this application please contact the software vendor and/or relative authorities.
summary: Watch professional and enthusiast LoL streams.
